content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
No structures have been successfully constructed on the map during these steps. Multiple attempts to place a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) did not complete due to crafting failures and inventory shortages. No other new structure entities have been added.

ERROR TIPS
----------
• API Call Consistency – When invoking get_entities, use the correct parameter style. Remove unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) and ensure the number of positional arguments matches the function’s definition.
• None Handling – Always check that get_entities returns an iterable. If it returns None, use an empty list fallback before attempting to iterate.
• Inventory Validation – Verify that a Lab is available in the inventory before attempting to place it on the map to prevent placement errors.
• Prerequisite Resource Management – Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, copper-cable) are available or producible before initiating Lab crafting.
• Production Chain Check – Ensure that resource conversion processes (such as smelting) reliably update material counts so that intermediate products meet the demands of complex crafting operations.
